thread.title: Germany’s Merkel says Facebook needs to do more against racist posts

author: newsr.in
title: Germany’s Merkel says Facebook needs to do more against racist posts
text: German Chancellor Angela Merkel urged Facebook to do more against racist comments and hate posts, in comments due to be published in a regional newspaper on Friday. Germany is expecting a record-breaking influx of refugees this year. Politicians and celebrities have voiced concern about a rise of xenophobic comments in German on Facebook and other […] »
